author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Detonate File or URL through McAfee ATD
automation.name: ATDDetonate

commands.description: upload a file/web URL for dynamic analysis by using the provided Analyzer Profile. Only single file/web URL can be submitted at a time.
commands.name: atd-file-upload

commands.description: fetches the list of task id's associated with a job id
commands.name: atd-get-task-ids

commands.description: Download the analysis report files. The `Sample Download Access` permission is required.
commands.name: atd-get-report

commands.description: display the analyzer profiles. Only the analyzer profiles to which the user has access are displayed.
commands.name: atd-list-analyzer-profiles

commands.description: displays the user profile information present on the McAfee Advanced Threat Defense.
commands.name: atd-list-user

commands.description: Checks the analysis status of up to 100 jobIDs/taskIDs
commands.name: atd-check-status

integration.description: Integrated advanced threat detection: Enhancing protection from network edge to endpoint
integration.name: McAfee Advanced Threat Defense

playbook.description: Detonates a URL using the McAfee Advanced Threat Defense sandbox integration.
playbook.name: Detonate URL - McAfee ATD

playbook.description: Detonates a File from a URL using the McAfee Advanced Threat Defense sandbox integration.
playbook.name: Detonate Remote File from URL - McAfee ATD

playbook.description:
Detonates a File using the McAfee Advanced Threat Defense sandbox.
Advanced Threat Defense supports the following File Types:
32-bit Portable Executables (PE)files; 64-bit PE+files
exe, sys, dll, com, scr, cpl, ocx, cgi
Microsoft Office Suite documents
doc,dotm, docx, dotx, xls, ppam, xlsx, pps, xlsb, ppsx, xlsm, ppsm, ppt, ppt, pptx, pptm, rtf, shs, xltm, sldm, xltx, sldx, xlam, thmx, docm, xar
Just Systems Ichitaro documents
jtd, jtdc
Adobe
pdf, swf
Compressed files
gz, 7z, tgz, msi, zip, lzh, cab, lzma, rar
Android application package
apk, Java, JAR, CLASS, Java Script, Java bin files
Image files
jpeg, png, gif
Other file types
cmd, ace, bat, arj, vbs, chm, xml, lnk, url, mof, htm, ocx, html, potm, eml, potx, msg, ps1, vb, reg, vba, wsc, vbe, wsf, vbs, wsh
playbook.name: ATD - Detonate File

description: Integrated advanced threat detection: Enhancing protection from network edge to endpoint
name: McAfee Advanced Threat Defense
